The \"%s\" note type settings are invalid. You need to configure the fields %s to continue using it

%d music intervals with parameters (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s) already exist in Anki database

plurals.name: recordings_clearing_prompt
plurals.item: The filename field contains one previously captured recording.\nDo you wish to clear it and start over or append subsequent recordings to it?
The filename field contains %d previously captured recordings.\nDo you wish to clear them and start over or append subsequent recordings to the list?

resources.string: Note type \"%s\" is not found in AnkiDroid. Create it?
Default note type \"%s\" is outdated in AnkiDroid. Update it?

The update requires a full upload of the database upon next collection sync.\nPlease synchronize changes with other devices if needed and accept \"Force full sync\" in AnkiDroid->Settings->Advanced to allow automatic update of the note type.
Too few fields in existing \"%s\" note type. Please add additional fields in AnkiDroid or choose another model
Music interval adding to AnkiDroid failed
Music interval seems to be already added to AnkiDroid (try to select sound file)
Music interval replaced. Please run "Check media" in AnkiDroid to find and delete the orphaned old sound file
Failed to add file to AnkiDroid media
Failed to add music interval to AnkiDroid
At least one specific option must be selected for field \"%s\"

When adding multiple music intervals at once, the selected set of sound files must obey the following rules:\n 1. The number of files must be equal to the number of unique interval permutations for the chosen field values.\n 2. The sound files, when sorted, must be ordered firstly by octave, then by note, then by interval.
Unknown error (try opening AnkiDroid to see what\'s wrong)
Invalid Anki Database: field and field name count mismatches
value must represent an AnkiDroid media reference (i. e. \"[sound:example.mp3]\")
value must an integer between %d and %d
value must represent a positive decimal number
allowed values: %s for non-unison intervals and an empty string for unison intervals
Tempo value must be in range of %d to %d (BPM)
First note duration coefficient must be a valid decimal number
\u0020and marked them using tag starting with \"%s\"
Error trying to play audio file
Audio capturing is available only on devices running Android 10 onwards
Do you wish to move the original files to thrash?
The selected files have different order when sorted by name and modification date.\nPlease choose which order should be used for batch adding (you\'ll be able to change it later in the file list)
Error loading selected files from the saved state
The selected list of files cannot be processed as it contains both entries with identical names and last modification dates, hence cannot be sorted
Some of the selected files have equal name - only sorting by last modification date is available
Some of the selected files have equal last modification date - only sorting by name is available
Log app version for added notes in a separate field
Mark identical intervals with special tag
Enable automatic creation and updating of the used model
Do not move any files to trash
Move to trash files created by MI2A once they processed
Move to trash both files created by MI2A and input files after they processed
